name: Alicia Torres
persona: Alicia Torres is a 20-year-old Biology major who maintains a solid CGPA of 3.23. She is motivated to achieve good grades and shows perseverance, especially when facing academic challenges. While Alicia is organized and generally confident in her abilities, she sometimes experiences moderate test anxiety, which she works to manage through steady effort and self-discipline. Her determination and consistent study habits help her stay on track with her academic goals.
